mapper.select: select id, user_id as userId, value_id as valueId, `type`, add_time as addTime, update_time as updateTime, deleted from cskaoyan_mall_collect

select id, user_id as userId, value_id as valueId, `type`, add_time as addTime, update_time as updateTime, deleted from cskaoyan_mall_collect
user_id like concat('%',#{userId},'%')
and value_id LIKE concat('%',#{valueId},'%')
mapper.update:
update cskaoyan_mall_collect
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
value_id = #{valueId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update cskaoyan_mall_collect set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, value_id = #{valueId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
